column2: Design engaging curriculum , foster coding skills, inspire students in a dynamic learning enviornment , proficiency in programming language. JD : Responsibilities: Plan, prepare, and deliver high-quality lessons in computer science to students in accordance with the school's curriculum and educational standards. Develop engaging and innovative teaching materials, resources, and activities to enhance student learning and understanding of computer science concepts. Create a positive and inclusive classroom environment that promotes active participation, critical thinking, and collaboration among students. Assess student learning and progress through a variety of formative and summative assessments, providing timely and constructive feedback to students and parents. Utilize technology effectively in teaching and learning, including interactive whiteboards, multimedia resources, and educational software applications. Stay updated on developments in the field of computer science, emerging technologies, and educational best practices, integrating relevant and current content into teaching. Foster a love for computer science and technology among students, encouraging curiosity, creativity, and independent exploration. Collaborate with colleagues, parents, and administrators to support the overall academic and social-emotional growth of students. Participate in professional development activities, workshops, and training sessions to enhance teaching skills and knowledge. Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned by the school administration.
column11: Teaching, curriculum development, Computer Science Teacher, professional development

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Computer Teacher to join our Department of Computer Science. The Computer Teacher will be responsible for delivering high-quality computer education to students at the higher secondary level. The ideal candidate will have a passion for teaching, a deep knowledge of computer science, and an ability to inspire students to excel.           Responsibilities:         Design and implement a comprehensive computer science curriculum that aligns with the schools vision and mission.     Deliver engaging and interactive lessons to students at the higher secondary level.     Create and grade assignments, quizzes, and exams.     Provide feedback and guidance to students to help them achieve their academic goals.     Keep up-to-date with advancements in computer science and integrate new technologies into the classroom.     Monitor and evaluate student progress and provide regular reports to parents and school administrators.     Work collaboratively with other teachers and staff to ensure a cohesive educational experience for students.             Qualifications:         A postgraduate degree in Computer Science or a related field.     A minimum of 3 years of teaching experience in computer science at the higher secondary level.     Excellent knowledge of programming languages such as Java, C++, Python, and Ruby.     Experience with database management, computer networks, and cybersecurity.     Ability to create engaging and interactive learning experiences for students.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with other teachers and staff.     A commitment to staying up-to-date with advancements in computer science and integrating new technologies into the classroom.         Eligible fields:         Computer Science     Information Technology     Computer Engineering     Software Engineering     Data Science     Cybersecurity     Information Systems     Computer Networks     Artificial Intelligence     Machine Learning         Note:               Salary for all positions will be based on qualification and experience and will not be a limiting factor for the right candidate
